Scope | Stockholm | Full-time | Backend Engineer

Scope is a search-engine that makes it easy for brands to find relevant influencers. Our mission is to make influencer search accessible to all brands worldwide.

Why us

- New but already proven product with fast growing revenue.

- We like to go away for a week now and then to work together in a completely new location somewhere in the world.

You

- want to be part of creating something new and build the global standard for influencer search

- understand trade-offs, value pragmatism over idealism

- might like neural networks, talk about space or sing

- might just like building a kick-ass search engine

Salary: mediocre

Equity possibilities, better than mediocre

Apply here in 2-3min: https://scopeapp.io/jobs

More about our product here: https://scopeapp.io/product
